description.en: Participants of  Master seminar  make presentations on topics of their Master's theses or other topics of general interest.
description.et: Magistriseminaris teevad üliõpilased ettekandeid magistritöö teemadel või muudel üldist huvi pakkuval erialastel teemadel.

objectives.en: The aim of  the Master Seminar is:
- to introduce topical issues in financial and actuarial mathematics;
objectives.et: - tutvustada üliõpilastele finants- ja kindlustusmatemaatika aktuaalseid probleeme;

objectives.en: - to stimulate and accelerate the process of composition of Master's Theses;
objectives.et: - seminariettekannete tegemise abil stimuleerida ja kiirendada magistritöö koostamist;

objectives.en: - to develop presentation and discussion skills of students.

independent_work.et: Two presentations in seminar, preferably on topic of master thesis. The topics of the presentations will be coordinated with the supervisor of the thesis.

description.et: First presentation (duration about 30 minutes) should introduce the topic of the master thesis and main ideas of the research.
Second presentation (duration about 30 minutes) should introduce the structure of the master thesis, main results obtained and problems/issues that are being addressed in the future work.

grade_preconditions.et: To pass the course, one must attend at least 80% of the seminars, present two talks and ask substantive questions from at least 2 other presenters.

grade_evaluation.et: To pass the course, one must attend at least 80% of the seminars, present two talks and ask substantive questions from at least 2 other presenters.

description.et: Seminar presentations by the participants on topic of their master's thesis.
